name: B&W Tek
overview: B&W Tek, Inc. provides optical systems and components. Its products include laser systems/modules, such as instrumentation lasers, including DPSS/diode lasers, multi-channel, spectrum stabilized lasers, fiber lasers/amplifiers, fiber coupled lasers, and broadband light sources; and high power lasers, including portable bench top fiber delivering laser systems, rack mount fiber coupled diode laser systems, and portable high power diode laser systems. The company also provides laser components, such as high power fiber coupling laser diodes and pigtailed diode lasers for optical pumping source, direct thermal, pyrotechnic ignition, medical instrumentation, research and development, and test and measurement source; spectrometer systems, such as online process analyzers, portable systems, and miniature systems; and array spectrometer modules. In addition, it offers Raman spectrometers, such as CleanLaze, a portable bench top excitation laser; i-Raman, a resolution portable spectrometer; OnlinePro, a process spectrometer; MiniRam, a portable spectrometer; BAC151, a video microscope sampling system; MiniRam II, a battery operated portable spectrometer; and BWID, a material identification software. Further, the company provides light sources and sampling accessories, such as light sources, fiber optics, integrating spheres, external battery packs, probes, multiplexers, sample holders, collimating lens assemblies, and add-ons. B&W Tek provides systems and components to the pharmaceutical, nutraceutical, semiconductor, defense, research, and process analytical markets. It offers its products through distributors in Brazil, Canada, China, France, Germany, India, Israel, Italy, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Mexico, the Philippines, Singapore, Spain, Thailand, Taiwan, the United Kingdom, and the United States. B&W Tek, Inc. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Newark, Delaware.
